text: The Comeback Trail is an American crime comedy movie written and directed by George Gallo. It is a remake of the 1982 movie of the same name by Harry Hurwitz. It stars Robert De Niro, Tommy Lee Jones, Morgan Freeman, Zach Braff, Emile Hirsch and Eddie Griffin. The movie was released on November 13, 2020, by Cloudburst Entertainment. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 comedy movies Category:2020s crime movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American crime movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by George Gallo
title: The Comeback Trail (2020 movie)
